attributes.action: Do not pay any MP whose party prorogues or suspends Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce legislation to back date this removal of all funding to apply from 27/8/2019.

The general public do not receive wages or salary is they chose not to attend their place of work and neither should MPs.

This web form does not allow a full action to be stated. The action finishes at 27/8/2019.
attributes.background: For the duration of the prorogue or suspension do not provide any funding or support from the public purse to these MPs in any form including salaries, expenses, allowances, office and living accommodation, medical benefits and pensions contributions.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
